name: Je-zee
description: a diplomat. Were you from allied factions, or of opposing goals?

name: Blish
description: a fellow mystic. Walking the same path or with wildly different beliefs about the Way?
Write in someone from your past when so inspired. If you gain the ability Old Friends, extend this list whenever you land in a new place.

name: Choss
description: a professional racer. Do you have hot tips for each other? Or are you always striving to outdo each other?

name: Jal
description: a ship mechanic. Have they always helped you with your ship? Or is The Ship theirs, and they want their due?

name: Yazu
description: a crooked cop. Family to cover up your tracks, or someone who still hunts you for getting them in trouble?

name: Yattu
description: a gang boss. Did you use to fly for them? Did you leave them in the lurch on a job?

name: Shod
description: a weapons dealer. A mentor or former partner who cashed out? Someone you owe?

name: Rye
description: an unrequited love. Was it your training and customs that got between you?

name: Ora
description: an info broker. Always coming to you with juicy tips?

name: Len
description: a black market dealer. Do they get you the parts no one else can? Did you fail to deliver something you promised?

name: Nyx
description: a moneylender. Are you a favorite client? Or a deadbeat with a debt?

name: Arryn
description: a Noble. An old friend or relative? Or someone you overstepped your bounds with?

name: Rhin
description: a smuggler. A trustworthy source that passes on tips? A rogue that came up in the ranks with you? Or a rival in your line of work?

name: Mav
description: a former mentor. What tricks did they teach you? Are they now jealous of your skill?

name: Battro
description: a bounty hunter. Have they let you go before? Are they looking for you now?

name: Meris
description: a scoundrel. Have you been on jobs together? Have they double-crossed you before?

name: Laxx
description: a xeno. Unusual friend or a dangerous foe? Way sensitive, or your “normal” friend?

name: Triv
description: a ship mechanic. Have they always helped you with your ship? Did you “forget” to pay them for a big upgrade?

name: Kerry
description: a Doctor. Do they always treat you? Or did you break their heart?

name: Lynie
description: a hospital admin. An old boss? Did they get in trouble for something you did?

name: Stev
description: a gambler of ill repute. Are you long-standing friends? Did you cheat at their table?

name: Juda
description: a Doctor. Do they still help you? Or was this an old rival who wants you punished for unlawful practice of medicine?

name: Kenn
description: a family member. Are they also a mechanic? Were you both vying for a parent’s attentions?

name: Krieger
description: a blaster pistol. Is this your favorite sidearm? Or is a rival carrying it to use on you?

name: Hicks
description: a mystic goods supplier. A reliable supplier of Vosian crystals, or a callous opportunist preying on your faith?

name: Horux
description: a former teacher. Do you go to them for advice even now? Or do they feel you’ve misused their teachings?

name: Nisa
description: a previous employer. A captain or a business owner? Did it end well?

name: Jackev
description: a drug dealer. Legitimate hookup or feeding a vice? Or did you cut into their profits?

name: Slice
description: a junkyard owner. What parts do they save for you? Or did you boost something of theirs?

name: Manda
description: a Guild member. Do you get the inside scoop? Or did you steal Guild secrets?

name: Aya
description: an assassin. An old lover still fond of you? A heart spurned? Or are you the target that got away?

name: Alben
description: a former patient. What did you treat them for? How can they help you now?

name: Ditha
description: a family member. Are they supportive of your work? Or are they trying to get you to come home?

name: Chon-zek
description: a bounty hunter. Former partner? Or a competitor from the same background?
